a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Death rates by broad cause category, World, 1990 to 2019
Age-standardized death rates from communicable/infectious diseases, non-communicable diseases (NCDs), and
injuries. This is measured in deaths per 100,000 people per year.
Source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease
